abstract.t: Open Caching architecture is a use case of Content Delivery Networks Interconnection (CDNI) in which the commercial Content Delivery Network (CDN) is the upstream CDN (uCDN) and the ISP caching layer serves as the downstream CDN (dCDN). This document proposed extensions to the [RFC8006] Medadata Model by way of a set of GenericMetadata objects that address extend the original CDNI capabilites to meet the more general needs of the CDN and Open Caching industry.
